Package net.sf.mmm.persistence.api.jpql

Provides the API for the Java Persistence Query Language (JPQL).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JpqlConstants
    This interface defines constants with keywords for JPQL.
    JpqlSyntax
    This interface is (mis)used to document the syntax the Java Persistence Query Language (JPQL).

Package net.sf.mmm.persistence.api.jpql Description

Provides the API for the Java Persistence Query Language (JPQL).

Persistence API JPQL

This package contains the specification of the Java Persistence Query Language (JPQL) syntax as JavaDoc. Initially we created our own type-safe builder for dynamic JPQL statements (mmm-persistence-query). However, we discovered that QueryDSL already provides this in a ideal way as ASL 2.0 licensed OSS project so we dropped our own API and implementation and recommend to use Query-DSL (rather than Criteria API).
